description:
Intertidal coastal habitat types of Namibia
Data source: Digitised by GreenMap Consultants from colour orthophotos Survey General +  identification of pebble beaches : shape file of Geological Survey of Namibia (based on expert input of Dr O'Toole and Bronwyn Currie)
Method of data acquisition: texture digitised from colour orthophotos Survey General ; wave exposure based on information Rod Braby, weather info and a study of Howes, Harper & Owens
keywords: Biosphere | Aquatic Habitat | Coastal Habitat, Namibia, Atlas
name: Namibia: Intertidal coastal habitat
